manifest_description.message: Access your Topicus KeyHub vaults directly from your browser.

not_connected.message: This extension is not connected to a Topicus KeyHub account. Visit your Topicus KeyHub profile and connect the extension.

missing_permissions.message: The extension does not have the required permissions.

pwd_description.message: Enter the password to unlock your vaults.

license_mismatch.message: Your Topicus KeyHub installation did not provide a valid license. It is not possible to use the browser extension.

confirm_link_unknown.message: It is not possible to verify the integrity of your Topicus KeyHub installation. Are you really sure you want to connect the Topicus KeyHub browser extension to $issuer$?

confirm_link.message: Do you want to connect the Topicus KeyHub browser extension to $issuer$?

already_linked.message: The Topicus KeyHub browser extension is already connected to $issuer$. It must be disconnected first before it can be connected again.

VAULT_ACTIVATION_REQUIRED.message: To read vault records, this group must first be activated.

VAULT_KEY_MISSING.message: Access to the vault is required for this action.
